sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular octagon has a side length of 5 cm. Find its perimeter.
message_2:
A regular octagon has 8 equal sides. To find the perimeter, simply multiply the side length by the number of sides.

Perimeter = side length × number of sides
Perimeter = 5 cm × 8
Perimeter = 40 cm

The perimeter of the regular octagon is 40 cm.
